Hot Streak 上衣(女用)
Hot Streak Shirt (Female)
kDesc
For all of you who feign mastery of the big table, who yearn to Streak, who are Hot to score, who are not afraid of the puck.
Pour tous ceux qui pensent être les meilleurs, qui ont la compèt' dans le sang et qui veulent aller droit au but.
Für alle, die den großen Tisch dominieren, Streaks herbeisehnen, Hot punkten wollen und keine Angst vor dem Puck haben.
Per tutti coloro che si credono i migliori, che bramano vincite consecutive, che trepidano per segnare e che non temono il disco.
Para todas aquellas que quieren ser las reinas de la mesa, que buscan las rachas, que son lo suficientemente buenas para puntuar y que no tienen miedo al disco.
Hot Streakの勇猛な選手にお似合いのシャツです。
커다란 테이블의 왕, 스트리크를 달성을 원하는 자, 점수를 넣고 싶은 분, 퍽을 두려워 하지 않는 분들을 위한 물건입니다.
For all of you who feign mastery of the big table, who yearn to Streak, who are Hot to score, who are not afraid of the puck.
你假裝掌握大局，誰嚮往，誰得分，誰不害怕冰球熱。
你假裝掌握大局，誰嚮往，誰得分，誰不害怕冰球熱。
For all of you who feign mastery of the big table, who yearn to Streak, who are Hot to score, who are not afraid of the puck.
